title: Recommendations for Planting Into Cover Crops

tasks.task: Operating a Planter in a Cover Crop Field
subtasks: Assess cover crop biomass for planting season
Determine cover crop management strategies (e.g., rolling, herbicide treatment)
Set planter to handle cover crop biomass and seed trench closure
Plant into either dead and dry cover crop or live, growing cover crop
Ensure soil is dry when planting into live cover crop
Apply nitrogen fertilizer with the planter below the cover crop layer
Monitor and address potential weeds using the cover crop mat
Monitor cover crop decomposition and carbon:nitrogen ratio
Adjust nitrogen fertilization strategy as needed (e.g., sidedressing)
Evaluate different cover crop species and planting dates
Research potential benefits and management challenges of cover crops
Network with experienced producers for tips and tricks
